body:
This looks like the selenium failure we were hitting earlier. We've disabled this test on master. I looked at the test output, and that's the only issue. Instead of dancing with CI to get this to pass, I think we can merge this as is, if @Osmose's change request has been satisfied.

@Osmose can you update your review?
